__e: He asked me for a cigarette and he jumped when I told him I didn't have any...
I was gonna smoke one cigarette, and if the guy owed me money didn't show, I'd go to his house, maybe fuck his wife, maybe kill his cheerleader daughter.
If we had a cigarette, a lighter and a password, we'd be back 10 years.
"I'm ready to kill for this cigarette, for this ice cream."
For my papa. One cigarette for my papa.
You got this cigarette to tell me your play.
Yeah. You know what would bring it down a notch? Some Hawaiian Punch and a chocolate cigarette.
That means I haven't had a cigarette in 18 years.
I must tell you. That man with the wooden cigarette in his mouth was brilliant.
So what was the cigarette doing in his hand?
What did tell you about smoking in here?
Tell you what, I'll write you up for smoking in a bar.
It's all right. It's only one cigarette.
An occasional cigarette won't hurt me.
It does more harm to the baby than a cigarette once in a while... - It's not once in a while.
Mary, didn't I tell you that I don't want any smoking in here ?
You ever see my mother without a cigarette in her hand?
It's been 5 years since I've seen you without a cigarette.
